desc: 测试查询员工表方法调用的案例, NOW, LTRIM, RTRIM, TRIM, CONCAT, SUBSTRING, LENGTH, YEAR, MONTH, DAY
name: SelectStaffSelfMethod

oqls.name: SelectStaffSelfMethod
oqls.oql: select NOW() as now, LTRIM(staffName), RTRIM(staffName), TRIM(staffName), CONCAT(staffName, '/', staffCode) as staff, LENGTH(staffName), YEAR(joinDate), MONTH(joinDate), DAY(joinDate) as day from Staff where staffName = '张三'
oqls.sql: select NOW(), LTRIM(STA_NAME), RTRIM(STA_NAME), TRIM(STA_NAME), CONCAT(STA_NAME, '/', STA_CODE), LENGTH(STA_NAME), YEAR(JOIN_DATE), MONTH(JOIN_DATE), DAY(JOIN_DATE) from STAFF where STA_NAME = '张三'
